question: A new site's gateway isn't able to form a tunnel to the Existing site-to-site Internet Protocol Security (IPseC) virtual private Network (VPN) device at headquarters. When testing connectivity betweenthe Remote site's gateway, it was observed that the external Internet Protocol (IP) Address of the gateway was set to 192.168.1.1. and was configured to send Outbound traffic to the Internet Service Provider (ISP)Gateway at4 192.168.1.2. options.C: Enable Point-to-Point Tunneling Protocol (PPTP) on the VPN devices at the new site and the corporate Headquarters.在新站点和公司总部的 VPN 设备上启用点对点隧道协议(PPTP)

question: Refer to the information below to answer the question.Desktop Computers in an organization were sanitized for re-use in an equivalent SecurityEnvironment. After Magnetic drives were degaussed twice according to the productManufacturer's Directions, what is the MOST LIKELY security issue with degaussing?请参考下面的信息来回答这个问题。组织中的台式计算机经过消毒，以便在同等的安全环境中重复使用。根据组织政策，数据被销毁，所有关于以前存储在磁性驱动器上的数据的敏感 性的标记和其他外部指示都被删除。根据产品制造商的说明，在消磁驱动器两次后，消磁最可能的安全问题是什么？

options.A: Commercial products often Have serious weaknesses of the magnetic force available in theDegausser Product.商业产品通常具有消磁器产品中可用的磁力的严重弱点
options.B: Degausser Products may NOT be properly maintained and operated.消磁器产品可能无法正确维护和操作
options.C: The inability to turn the drive Around in the chamber for the second pass due to human error.由于人为错误，无法在腔室中转动驱动器以进行第二次通过
options.D: Inadequate record keeping when Sanitizing media.对介质进行消毒时记录不充分。

question: A system with Internet Protocol (IP) address 10.102.10.2 has a physical address of00:00:08:00:12:13:14:2f. The following static entry is added To its Address Resolution Protocol(ARP) table: 10.102.10.6: 00:00:08:00:12:13:14:2f.What form of attack could this represent?一个拥有互联网协议（IP）地址 10.102.10.2 的系统的物理地址是 00:00:08:00:12:13:14 2f。以下静态条目被添加到其地址解析协议（ARP）表中。10.102.10.6: 00:00:08:00:12:13: 4:2f.这可能代表什么形式的攻击？

options.A: A Denial of Service (DoS) attack against the gateway router because the router can no longer accept packets from.对网关路由器的拒绝服务（DoS）攻击，因为该路由器不能再接受来自的数据包。
options.B: A transport layer attack that prevents the resolution of 10.102.10.6 address.一个传输层的攻击，阻止了 10.102.10.6 地址的解析。
options.C: A Denial of Service (DoS) attack against 10.102.10.2 because it cannot respond correctly to ARP requests.针对 10.102.10.2 的拒绝服务（DoS）攻击，因为它不能正确响应 ARP 请求。
options.D: A masquerading attack that sends packets intended for 10.102.10.6 to 10.102.10.2.一个伪装攻击，将打算用于 10.102.10.6 的数据包发送到 10.102.10.2。

question: An organization operates a legacy Industrial Control System (ICS) to support its core business service, which carrot be replaced. question: A cloud service accepts Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) assertions from users to on and security. However, an attacker was able To spoof a registered account on the network and query the SAML provider. What Is the MOST common attack leverage against this flaw?一个云服务接受来自用户的安全断言标记语言（SAML）断言，以对和安全。然而，一个攻击者能够欺骗网络上的注册账户，并查询 SAML 供应商。针对这个缺陷，最常见的攻击手段是什么？

question: 首席执行官（CEO）希望对公司的信息安全状况进行内部审计。CEO希望避免审计过程中的任何偏见，因此指派销售总监进行审计。经过数周的大量互动，审计得出公司的政策和程序是充分、稳健且完善的结论。然后，CEO又聘请了一家外部渗透测试公司，以展示组织强大的信息安全态势。这次测试却揭示了几个关键安全控制方面的重大缺陷，并且表明事件响应流程仍未记录在案。审计结果和外部渗透测试结果存在差异的最可能原因是什么？

options.B: 渗透测试活动和内部审计的范围有显著差异。

options.B: Leverage a Secure Socket Layer (SSL) connection over a virtual private network (VPN) to download sensitive data upon arriving at the destination.
options.C: Keep laptops, external storage devices, and smartphones in the hotel room when not in use.
options.D: Use multi-factor authentication (MFA) to gain access to data stored on laptops or external storage devices and biometric fingerprint access control mechanisms to unlock smartphones.

question: When network management is outsourced to third parties, which of the following is the MOST effective method of protecting critical data assets?

options.B: Employ strong access controls

question: Which of the following regulations dictates how data breaches are handled?

question: Security Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) expects application code to be written in a consistent manner to allow ease of auditing and which of the following?

options.B: The scope of the penetration test exercise and the internal audit were significantly different.
